summary: I OWN A 2003 INFINITI G35.  THE CAR IS 7 MONTHS OLD WITH LESS THAN 10,000 MILES ON IT.   I WAS TOLD BY MY DEALERSHIP THAT I HAD NO FRONT BRAKES.  I BROUGHT THE CAR IN BECAUSE 3 LIGHTS WERE LIGHTING UP ON MY DASH FOR A  COUPLE OF DAYS:  THE BRAKE LIGHT, THE SLIP LIGHT, AND THE VDC OFF LIGHT.  I WAS SHOCKED TO LEARN THAT I DIDN'T HAVE ANY FRONT BRAKES.  TO ME, THIS IS DEFINITELY A SAFETY ISSUE.  *JB
